reviews.text: It's a must see place when visiting Chandigarh first time. Ideally the tour should start from here and one or two hours be spent for learning the making of Chandigarh. Ideal place for every student, emphasizing the need of planning, designing and management as well as vision of the leaders.  There are displays of master plans, blue prints, important communications, photographs and story of Chandigarh. Two floor building is very calm and quiet, not crowded, will help the visitor to move in a comfortable pace. Large compound with large parking.

It was a lifetime experience for me they have kept it very nicely, it's a perfect place for people who are so fond of knowledge. Do visit it guys you'll get know so much about different different things they even have the history of dinosaurs i found that really fascinating.
It is excellent infact the Best museum in Chandigarh. The information is detailed and in an order due to which it is easy to understand
Amazing tourist place but it close at 4:40pm
Awesome architecture.  Enjoy the arts here.

I had been searching for a couple of books and could find those all here at this shop... The staff here is quite well versed with the latest editions of various books.. They are also quite friendly and polite.... One of the best book stores in Model Town area Ludhiana.
Better books can be kept with insights of books. It's centrally located in High Court.
Place to find books and journals on Indian law and decision of supreme and high court's in Honorable Punjab and Haryana High court
This place is situated in Punjab and Haryana High Court Complex chandigarh near Gate no.1. Most of indian law books available here and other stationary aslo related to lawyers.
According to my experience I had seen that place very nice.
Great place. Tourist can visit this place...

The tourist will visit the Hon’ble High Court, Open Hand Monument, Punjab Assembly and the top floor of Punjab & Haryana Civil Secretariat.
The tourist will visit in three Batches i.e at 10:00 A.M, 12:00 AM and 3:00 PM. The tourist will be sent for visit to the designated places in groups of not more than 30 persons.
A single window pass system has been started in the Tourist Facilitation Center by the representatives of the Chandigarh tourism department
Persons wishing to visit the said places can apply online as well as personally at Tourism Facilitation Center. The visitors shall be required to show their original ID proof when personally arriving at the tourism Facilitation center i.e. passport, aadhar card, driving license, voter ID or ration card.
 
 Only lady purse, mobile phone and camera will be allowed to be taken along for the said visit after searching and frisking and scanning by the x-ray baggage machine.
Any inflammable material, alcohol ,smoking material, lighters, weapon, sharp edged weapon, etc will be not be permitted to be taken along during the said visit.
 After searching & frisking, one tourism police person, one guide from the tourism department and one armed person from the Chandigarh Police security will accompany the visitors and will guide them to the Hon’ble High Court and open hand Monuments area. At the barrier between the open Hand Monument and the assembly, the Chandigarh Police security person will withdraw And only the tourism police person and the tourism department guide will accompany them to the Punjab assembly, where Punjab assembly security will take over. After the Punjab assembly’s visit, the Chandigarh Tourism Police and tourism department guide will accompany the visitors to the Punjab & Haryana Civil secretariat. The Punjab assembly security will withdraw at the boundary between Punjab Vidhan Sabha and the Punjab & Haryana Civil Secretariat, where CISF will take over the security. Then, CISF and the Tourism Police and the Chandigarh tourism guide will accompany them up to the top floor of the Punjab & Haryana Civil Secretariat.
 On completion of the visit, the tourism police and the Chandigarh tourism guide will accompany the visitors to the Tourist facilitation center from the main road itself where all the passes shall be taken back by the Tourism facilitation center pass issuing officials.
The Tourist police personnel are only for guidance of tourists and to keep the group together, so that no moves alone away from the group.
 Inform the concerned Police Station one day advance regarding date,time and venue of shooting.
 If there is any change in the schedule of shooting,you will inform the concerned police station as well as to this office immediately.
 While shooting on the roads it must be ensured that there is no obstacle in traffic movement and inconvenience to the passersby and follow the Traffic Rules of the Administration.
 You will ensure not to hamper the free flow of traffic during peak hours i.e 08.00 AM to 11.00 AM and 04.00 PM to 07.00 PM.
 You will ensure not to allow to disturb the sentiments of general public before/during/after shooting.
 You will insure not to shoot any vulgar scene/song etc.
 You will insure not to shoot any anti social scene.
 You will insure not shoot any anti national scene.
 In case of playing loud music etc.during shooting, a permission from the concerned authority will taken by you before the shooting.
 You will ensure quick access to shooting location of an officer of Bollywood Facililtation Cell to have on the spot inspection.
 In case of any dispute,jurisdiction of local courts shall apply.
 In case of use of any animal in the film shoot,you must abide by the guidelines of Animal Welfare Board and obtain prior permission.
 No. violation of any rule be committed.

The Punjab Legislative Assembly or the Punjab Vidhan Sabha (Punjabi: ਪੰਜਾਬ ਵਿਧਾਨ ਸਭਾ) is the unicameral legislature of the state of Punjab in northern India. At present, it consists of 117 members, directly elected from 117 single-seat constituencies. The tenure of the Legislative Assembly is five years unless dissolved sooner. The current Speaker of the Assembly is Rana KP Singh. The meeting place of the Legislative Assembly since 6 March 1961 is the Vidhan Bhavan in Chandigarh. The current ruling party is the Indian National Congress with 2/3rd Majority .

The Legislative Assembly in Capitol Complex is one of the best places to see in Chandigarh. Facing the High Court, Chandigarh, this building is beautifully and excellently designed. The Pyramid covering the Upper Chamber is extraordinarily attractive and graceful.

Each chamber of legislature consists of a number of legislators who use some form of parliamentary procedure to debate political issues and vote on proposed legislation. There must be a certain number of legislators present to carry out these activities; this is called a quorum.

Some of the responsibilities of a legislature, such as giving first consideration to newly proposed legislation, are usually delegated to committees made up of small selections of the legislators.

The members of a legislature usually represent different political parties; the members from each party generally meet as a caucus to organize their internal affairs.

The internal organization of a legislature is also shaped by the informal norms that are shared by its members.

Address: Capitol Complex, Sector 1, Chandigarh

Punjab &  Haryana vidhan Sabha is  a one of the best builing. Sessions if both assemblies are held in this building. Speakers if both assemblies are having their office in this building. The name of the building is written as Punjab Vidhan Sabha. Who has wrtten this name to this building might be correct. But Haryana satate is also conducting businesx in this building whose outer  picture is dispayed. Can some also say it Haryana Vidhan Sabha?

Great place for a family outing. Just adjoining the garden there are options for fun games and car racing etc. also. I liked the garden a lot because of land scape and variety of flowers and plants. Beat time to visit is spring season. Not very far from Chandigarh so one can stay in Chandigarh and go for one day picnic.

Historical place with large no .of visitors it even offer wedding arrangements . Being close to home I have  visited countless times but unfortunately at one side it has aesthetics on other end the decline in no. Of animals it used to have declined...it was such. Great experience once to take a full round and so many species of animal but that too is history now

This place has it's own goodness. 
A perfect place for family visits or with a partner. 
This is a beautiful garden that also contains a restaurant and a bar (Haryana tourism) for refreshing the people who visit here. Some new engaged couples also visit here for their portraits ( with self hired photographers ) normally , one can spend maximum 3 hours here. Entry per head - 25/- 

Do visit. ❤️

Very beautiful and quiet place near Chandigarh to spend time with family.. enjoy the day having picnic with family or friends.. bring lunch or snacks here or you can buy here as well and enjoy the time along with beautiful pics.. there are few gaming options as well outside the garden which adds the entertainment for kids

Great place to visit and well maintain too, but the only one complaint from the management is they charge Rs.25/- per person to visit the place and as per my observation most of the visitors are a tourist, there is a toilet available inside the garden but not maintain and clean. As they are charging fees for visiting the place then they should need to provide such basic need to the visitors. My overall experience was good. Rest you can see in photos and videos. Thanks,

Beautiful rose garden, well maintained. Do come on weekends. Its located in sector 15. Space for car parking also available. You can enjoy coconut water, various flavor of ice creams, lemon soda. Best time to visit is in evening as it glows various colour full lights there. Lot of fountains with ample sitting space. Best for jogging yoga exercise, whatever you love to do.

The Rose Garden as the name suggest has different varieties of roses white , red, Yellow, orange,pink with a specific scientific name written...
The sizes of roses are also very Big.
The park is large and spread over 30 acres..
The garden is well maintained with good grass..
The trees also beautiful..
It also has a fountain..

Good to spend time here
Moreover eating facilities and washrooms are also available..
A Nala passes in between the park and has bridge to cross over it..

My mom used to come here when she lived in Chandigarh for a while. When I visited, it was nice. However, i noticed that the water (lake) was drained. It did not look very aesthetic. Wish they were fixing it at a different time. The flowers look very beautiful. If you are in Chandigarh, I recommend visiting this garden. It is also a great place for studying or reading (or relaxing in general). I just want to put out a request for people to not damage the flowers and plants. If you are taking photos, please be aware of your surroundings. This is a beautiful place, and we should keep it this way.

Visited during summer vacations and hardly found any rose. Summer definitely not the right time to visit the garden. There is not much greenery also to sit during summer. Recommended for other seasons. Kids did not enjoy much and all we could see was little squirrel 🐿 at entrance. Must be much better place during season other than summer.

Opened in 1967, this place has been one of the scenic beauty types place where you can visit anytime for nice views. The garden is well managed by the managing body. Also if you are one who is very fond of roses and would like to take a look at different varieties of roses, then this is the place for you. Also during the time of valentine's week, there is a rose festival organised here. So visit this place during this time and you will definitely worth it. For the rest of the year, this place is chic and quiet. So a good place for finding peaceful environment for a short time in a day or so

Pride of Chandigarh. Good for pedal boats. Excellent track for joggers and walkers. Nice romantic place to hang out in the evening. The only downside is perhaps the people not adhering to the civic sense of maintaining the cleanliness and throwing papers along the track. Still I love it!!

Had a great experience at Sukhna lake. Wow what a view. You can have pedal, shikara, motor boating experience over here. I suggest for pedal boat, to have a joyful ride. There is very long jogging track in its bank. Its a famous tourist place, near Rock garden. Best place to see sunrise and Sunset.

It’s a good place to relax with friends and family in Chandigarh. Very spacious and quiet place. It also has huge car parking, many eatery shops. One can easily spend an hour or two here. I will love to visit here again.

When I visited Chandigarh, I heard about this lake a lot! My experience said that if you are visiting here then please prefer winter or rainy season! One time visit place! Loved essence of this place!

Awesome place to get connected with nature. A peaceful place in very busy city. We had great experience of boating over here. Perfect Plac to have fun with friends. Some other small rides are also available here. Sketch artist are here to make sketch of your. This place will also give a choice of food with restaurants situated here.

A lovely restaurant. The food is really good incredible and the service is even better!) So attentive but not overbearing. They really do go above and beyond to make it an incredible dining experience. Thank you so much for a lovely evening!!

Definitely would like to share my experience. It an amazing place. Good food , nice ambience and great service. You guys know the true meaning of hospitality. Keep the good work going. And keep the flag high.

this place was delivered  so yummy food. 
once I will order a pizza and white pasta. I really enjoyed.
interior was also awesome. it plays good role to make a day. . 
its a good combination. of Colors.
staff was also good . friendly behaviour.,friendly atmoshere.  
thanks for every thing.

This place is amazing. The top two buffet options in Chandigarh are Pirates of Grill and BBQ Nation. Not able to decide who's the best. You can go here for buffet and good time with your pals. 

Staff: 5/5
Staff is more than friendly.

Cleanliness: 4/5
Restroom is also OK if not the best. 

Variety of food: 4/5

Taste: 5/5

Liquor: 4/5

Bookings: 5/5
They have dedicated app for this on Google Play Store.

Overall, the best place for buffet in Chandigarh. Cheers.

Over priced for the menu they provide us with. Nice concept could be implemented in a lot better way. They can add more variety to the menu everyday. Getting in a out of Elante Mall is a lot of hassle. Not a spot for a quick visit. Staff is brilliant. Worth a visit if you have spare 1000 bucks to play with for just one person.
This is one of the best non veg and Veg food joints in Chandigarh which is part of famous food chain Chawla Chicken. It serves take away and also through Zomato and other food delivery apps.
Must try their Cream chicken...awsome with butter naans😋😋😋yummmmy
Very poor quality of butter chicken avoid visiting here for butter chicken, no butter or even butter smell in  BUtter chicken  poor quality of bread crumbs used in cooking.
very expensive to othar and very slow service
Delicious Non veg variety available with affordable price.

A visibly vibrant place and good seating arrangement but the food quality doesn't match the expectation. Serving portion is less. Menu needs revamp to suit locale cuisine and portion size should increase.

We are new to Chandigarh.... We heard many things about elanta mall so we went there and must say very good mall... Have been to Nando's.. The menu was unique and tasty... Compare to price the quantity was not upto the mark but quality was good... Ambience is  also attractive.. Staff is also very cooperative and friendly... Non veg menu was also good... Here u can get alcoholic and non Alcoholic both the drinks.. So go for it..

Loved the food they served, so happy to visit this place. Had the brand dinner tonight with delicious food. It's a great place to eat and enjoy with your friends and family. They serve alcohols too, so don't worry about it.

Been here a few times whilst visiting Chandigarh. I compare to Nandos in the UK and on that basis it gets a 5 star. 

Food comes out fast and staff are attentive. 

Food quality is same as UK. If ordering normal burger, wings or similar then you can't go wrong. 

The main reason for not giving 5 stars would be some of the promotional food or special menu items miss the mark.
By far the best Mexican I've had in the city. The service was good. The staff was nice. And they seemed to care about what matters to me as a customer. So, bonus points for that.
Been visiting this place for several years and love the food and the ambience here. Food is priced nominally and bill comes to around 2k for 4 persons. Though food waiting time is usually 20 mins

Excellent service here with good food. If you love fast food like Pizza, Pasta, Grilled Sandwich, Sizzler, cake, cookies, pastries and Shakes. Then this is one place which needs to be explored on regular basis. I have been visiting here since last 20 years. What I like the most is that every thing is freshly baked right from pizza base to each marinade. Toppings especially chicken and barbecue are just great. Price wise it is much less but quantity of topping is almost double of what so called multinational chains like Dominos And Pizza Hut offer. The base of Pizza is crisp. Be patient with the service since your orders are freshly made.
Very good taste. Service n ambience r good in sector 35C. Non veg lovers must try grilled fish. Parking space available.

Yeah its a fantastic place for pizzas and the best food item in oven fresh is Enchilados. This time I tried the chicken sizzler but the taste is very unpleasant and I feel like its really a waste of money. Day by day they decreases their quality.

Fruit cake is awesome. So light n yummy it just melts in mouth. My personal favourites are mushroom and broccoli Alfredo sandwich, Oriental sizzler, arabiata pasta. In drinks cappuchilo, cafe frappe are must have summer drinks.
The best chicken house in Chandigarh near sector 22 it’s in walking distance from the private bus booking center
Preparation is not gid n quality has declined in last few years. Also sitting arrangement is very shabby n u may find some people drinking in car parks in front. Not suggested for families.
Food was great, Both the afghan and chicken tandoori were awesome. It was juicy and correctly cooked.Looks like an old joint. But will surely go back for more food again
Decent place for family and friends...chicken is delicious but sometimes they compromise a few things..

I had mixed feelings while visiting this place was excited as i heard it was quite old in town. The chicken malai tikka was good, however they need to improve few things to keep the old charm alive. The services and staff needs to be improved. They should work on the surrounding of the restaurant too. The place is very easy to be access if they improve these little things it's a good place to hangout.
Very good ambience and ample parking space. Their rum and raisin icecream was phenomenal. Frozen margarita was great too. Also had veg clay pot and dragon spring rolls. Both were excellent dishes.

It's a nice, quite place with decent decor and food that's actually good, though a wee bit too rich for my liking. However, sitting spaces can be designed better, as ergonomics are not good when it comes to the actual dining part,  and the tab can be quite steep. Service passes muster and can be better.

It takes you to Old Australian Era.

Ambiance is simply breathtaking.

I just tried beverages it was amazing exp.
Nice place to have good food and drinks. The location is calm and peaceful in night.
Nice food and ambience. Parkjng easy. Dish of lotus stem is excellent
